feed.title: JSON-RPC is BIP territory or not?

entry.title: JSON-RPC is BIP territory or not?
entry.summary: In a Bitcoin development thread on February 28, 2012, the process of a BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal) for getmemorypool was discussed. Stefan Thomas commented on the content but chose to wait until the BIP was officially proposed before sharing his thoughts. He was encouraged to comment in the original thread if he preferred.
